name: Notion Book Notes Template
description: Any type of reading is better than no consumption at all, so to give myself "permission" to read without having to worry about taking comprehensive notes, I came up with a book notes system that allowed me to dial up or down my commitment to the book.This let me worry less about the notes I felt like I had to take and just start reading!Check out my full Notion course: Build Your Command Center in Notion.
